description: Hi there! I am a MERN Stack Developer, FrontEnd and BackEnd Developer, and my name is Abdullah Al Mahmud. I am from Feni, Bangladesh. With regards to web development, I have a particular passion for learning new things. I build web applications with the use of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, Next.js, and many more technologies. I also specialize in responsive and dynamic website creation. My work as a backend developer involves technology such as Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. For testing and deploying applications, I utilize Postman, GitHub, Vercel, and other version control tools. As a full-stack developer, I am scaling and securing applications with TypeScript and CORS.
